biotools.summary: This tool uses protein structural features (protein loops as classified in ArchDB and/or domains as classified in SCOP) to determine whether any pair of proteins interact or not. To do that, it uses data from both known protein interactions and putative non-interacting proteins, assigning positive and negative scores to the structural features. The main result page displays a summary of the predictions for the given protein pairs with available detailed data for each prediction.
